name: Get Balsamic Vinegar
description:
You are asked to buy things for a salad.

But once you're at the grocery store it's hard to remember what to buy and what not.

The things that are there and that are not there in the end will have an influence on your life.

You only need the key to play.

Exit any time with .

Named after the Snow Patrol song of the same name about dysfunctional relationships.

Note: this is still incomplete.
